title: How to stop Google assistant on phone responding if in flight mode if Nest hub in same room
content:
I set my phone to flight mode when I'm in the same room as my Nest hub.

I want to control ceiling lights, so tell Google assistant to turn off the lights. 

The issue:
Phone responds with the "You're phones in flight mode so I can't help with that right now" answer.

Nest hub performs the action as expected.

What I want:
I want to stop the annoying phone Google assistant from responding when it's in flight mode when another device (my Nest hub) can respond.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
